summary: A simple ranged wood-elf follower that levels with the player.
descriptionHtml:
A simple ranged wood-elf follower that levels with the player.
You can find Gorgio in Dragonsreach, where he walks around, attends meals, and trains with his bow out on the Great Porch.
This is my first mod so please let me know if I did something incorrectly or any other constructive criticism.
This is also my first time actually taking screenshots, believe it or not, so if you guys don't like them I would really appreciate it if you could take some of your own and get them here!

I have fixed the gray face bug and re-uploaded it!

Thanks,
Dieselpup999

Change Log:
1.2:
Fixed gray face bug
1.1:
Fixed some silly mistakes in the Creation Kit that made him unable to follow you.
author: Dieselpup999

files.name: Gorgiov1-1
files.changelogHtml: Fixed Gorgio being unable to follow you.
